document_data.name: Glarleer's
document_data.mainbody: '''Glarleer's''' was a tavern in the town of [[Loudwater]] in the [[Delimbiyr Vale]] in the midâ€“14{{th}} century [[DR]].{{Cite web/Candlekeep forum/Questions for Ed Greenwood (2010)/Loudwater Layout}}
document_data.Location: It was situated in the central western part of the city.
document_data.Structure: It had two stories: an open main floor at ground level and an upper floor divided into a series of private booths.
document_data.Atmosphere: A fairly high-class establishment, it was a place people went to to be seen. There was [[music]] and dancing on the ground floor; appetizer dishes known as "lightplatters" were served; and fences, middlemen, and [[coinlass]]es of a more sophisticated sort could be encountered.
